artview.components.Display¶

class artview.components.Display(Vradar, Vfield, Vtilt, Vlims=None, airborne=False, rhi=False, name='Display', parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: artview.core.core.Component

Class that creates a display plot, using a returned Radar structure from the PyArt pyart.graph package.

Methods

Display.FieldSelectCmd(nombre) Captures field selection and redraws the new field.
Display.LaunchGUI() Launches a GUI interface.
Display.NewField(variable, value, strong) Display changes after field in Variable class is altered.
Display.NewLims(variable, value, strong) Display changes after limits in Variable class is altered.
Display.NewRadar(variable, value, strong) Display changes after radar Variable class is altered.
Display.NewTilt(variable, value, strong) Display changes after tilt in Variable class is altered.
Display.RngRingSelectCmd(ringSel) Captures Range Ring selection and redraws the field with range rings.
Display.TiltSelectCmd(ntilt) Captures tilt selection and redraws the field with new tilt.
Display.__init__(Vradar, Vfield, Vtilt[, ...]) Initialize the class to create display.
Display.addButtons() Add a series of buttons for user control over display.
Display.cmapSelectCmd(cm_name) Captures colormap selection and redraws.
Display.guiStart([parent])
Display.keyPressEvent(event) Allow tilt adjustment via the Up-Down arrow keys.
Display.setUILayout() Setup the button/display UI layout.
Display.toolCustomCmd() Allow user to activate self-defined tool.
Display.toolDefaultCmd() Restore the Display defaults.
Display.toolROICmd() Creates and connects to Region of Interest instance
Display.toolValueClickCmd() Creates and connects to Point-and-click value retrieval
Display.toolZoomPanCmd() Creates and connects to a Zoom/Pan instance.
